mapper.insert: insert into tb_plan (staff_id, plan_profit, plan_time, plan_stand, plan_mark) VALUE (#{staff_id},#{plan_profit},#{plan_time},#{plan_stand},#{plan_mark})
mapper.update: update tb_plan set plan_profit=#{plan_profit}, plan_time=#{plan_time}, plan_stand=#{plan_stand}, plan_mark=#{plan_mark}, staff_id=#{staff_id} where id=#{id};
